page.title: 04THE WOODCARVER
page.content: The woodcarver has been working in his shop for about nine years making all sorts of woodcarvings such as bowls, tables, chess boards and pieces,lamps and carved faces. McNasties are a recent idea which the woodcarver has developed. He describes them as being "Scotland's smallest Clan,(average height around 3 inches),now only found in the Cairngorm Mountains where they eke out a meagre living by melting down spent shotgun cartridges and re-stilling the dregs from whisky bottles to make their own ferocious blend, the famous Glen Toxic!" He uses pine, birch, and alder to make his carvings. In the summer his shop is quite busy. Over the winter he carves the pieces to be sold in the shop in the summer.
